The Node class for handling parsing recursive list system

The Main Menu.

An array of images for the main menu, where each slot represents a selected index in the menu

The motion.

mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class backbone.Controls
Calulate rotation due to moving the mouse
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class backbone.Controls
Fires portals, blue if left mouse button, orange if right mouse button
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class backbone.Controls
 
mouseX - Variable in class backbone.Controls
The amount to turn in yaw because of the mouse.
mouseY - Variable in class backbone.Controls
The amount to turn in pitch because of the mouse.
move(ReadOnlyVector3, ReadOnlyVector3, ReadOnlyVector3, boolean) - Method in class backbone.Controls
Moves an object represented by a position, direction its facing, and move vector
move(Camera, Vector3, boolean) - Method in class backbone.Controls
Moves the camera throughout the environment
move(Camera, double) - Method in class backbone.Controls
Moves the camera based on key/mouse input
move() - Method in class portal.Bullet
Moves the bullet, kills it if neccessary, or returns the portalable surface if it will create a portal
mt - Variable in class sound.SoundPlayer
The thread updating music frames
